mean_en: to use money to earn more money; to use your money to purchase property or shares in a company, etc. in order to make a profit
word_etyma: in进+vest衣服→把衣服中的钱放进事业中→invest投资
sentence: I decided to invest in the housing market because the housing price kept rising.
sentence_trans: 因为房价一直在涨，所以我决定投资房地产。
